actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A resolution to provide for a study of the impact that certain federally owned land has on local government.

summary.text: Requests the Administrator of General Services of the United States to conduct a study of the impact that the presence of any real property owned by the Federal Government has on units of general local government within whose jurisdiction such real property is situated. Suggests the study should include the effect such property has on local revenues and local goods and services. Exempts certain types of public lands from the study, including real property located within the National Park System, the National Wilderness System, or the National Forest System, lands administered by the Secretary of the Interior through the Bureau of Land Management, and lands dedicated to the use of water resource development projects of the United States.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for a study of the impact that certain federally owned land has on local government.
